channel.title: operating systems on Dominik Rys
channel.description: Recent content in operating systems on Dominik Rys

item.title: Short Guide on Self-Teaching About Operating Systems
item.description: I’ve recently graduated with a Computer Science degree from the University of Birmingham. Overall, the course covered most of the fundamentals of computer science. However, the course structure changed starting from the year below me, moving the operating systems module from the third to the second year. Since I took a year out for a year in industry, this meant that I completely missed out on the operating systems module!
